attributes.additional_details:
In 2013, he was announced as the latest addition to the cast of EastEnders, playing Mick Carter, the landlord of The Queen Victoria. He had previously turned down a role in 2009, and in his autobiography, Straight Up, said that he would not join the cast until he was "fat, bald and fifty". He won the Serial Drama Performance award at the National Television Awards in 2015, and again in 2016.

Danial Dyer is an inspiration to the British working class and should therefore be named Lord.
attributes.background: He is an English actor who has worked in television, film and theatre Dyer was often typecast in "hard-man" roles, although it was this image that allowed him to present The Real Football Factories and Danny Dyer's Deadliest Men.
